title: How to settle my bill?
content:
You can safely transfer money to pay your bills through our official payment portal, visit the link: https://pay.switchfiber.ph/
We accept Gcash, Maya, WeChat Pay, Debit or Credit Card payments.
Follow this guide on how to settle your account:
1. Open your browser (Google Chrome, Safari, Firefox, etc.) and visit the link for our online payment portal: https://pay.switchfiber.ph/
2. Type in your Account number and Contact number which appears to your SOA (Statement of Account)
The SOA (Statement of Account) is sent to your registered email address and mobile number
3. Ensure that all of your account details are correct
4. Type in the amount to be paid
5. Select your preferred mode of payment (whether GCash, Maya, Debit/ Credit Card)
To pay through GCASH, select QR PH. Wait for it to generate a QR Code, kindly screenshot the generated QR Code. Open your GCASH App, tap the QR Code Scanner which is located in the middle-bottom section of the app. Tap “Upload QR”, select the screenshot from your phone’s gallery.
6. Verify the amount to be paid, click “Proceed”
7. Click “Back to Homepage”

title: What are your payment channels?
content:
You can safely transfer money to pay your bills through these official online facilities:
GCash (Through QR Ph), WeChat Pay, Maya, Debit and Credit Card (MasterCard, Visa, and JCB)
Access our online payment portal through this link: https://pay.switchfiber.ph/

title: What is your business hours?
content: We’ll try our best to accommodate you, our business operations are from Monday to Saturday 8:00 a.m. to 5:00 p.m.

title: How to apply as a Freelance Sales Agent?
content:
We are currently looking for Freelance Sales Agents that will help us expand our reach and connectivity throughout Rizal!

If you want to be part of us, just email the following requirements:

  • Resume or Bio Data
  • Government Issued ID

Submit only (1) for Primary ID e.g. Passport, Driver’s License, National ID, SSS, GSIS, UMID, PRC ID, Senior Citizen

Submit (2) for Secondary IDs e.g. Postal ID (Issued 2015 onwards), Voter’s ID, TIN ID, OFW ID, Company ID

Note: We DO NOT accept Barangay ID, Police Clearance ID, PWD ID, Solo Parent, Pagibig Loyalty Card Plus, and PRC

  • Certificate of Residency or Lease Agreement.

For us to know the length of your stay or how long are you residing to that address.

  • NBI Clearance

Qualifications:

  • Willing to do field work, house-to-house selling
  • Sales experience is an advantage
  • Willing to work during weekends and holidays
  • With strong personality and good communication skills

Instructions:

Email your complete requirements at: switchfiberinternet@gmail.com

Subject must be the Job

Ensure that you’re willing to be assign in Binangonan, Rizal

We are looking forward to review your applications!
